scripts.release:major: changelog -M -u https://github.com/tagraha/bapel && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m -u https://github.com/tagraha/bapel && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p -u https://github.com/tagraha/bapel && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin --tags
